## ğŸ§¿ How to use
Use this repository as template for your project and run:

`yarn install`
or
`yarn`

To run this project use:

`yarn dev`

To run tests use:
`yarn test`
Or to run in watch mode:
`yarn test:watch`

Or use as template when creating your new repository
